## ThirdwebSDK.getNFTDrop() method

Get an SDK interface for an NFT Drop program

**Signature:**

```typescript
getNFTDrop(address: string): Promise<NFTDrop>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  address | string | Address of the program |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[NFTDrop](./solana.nftdrop.md)&gt;

SDK interface for the program
